entities.name: ron
entities.description: A familiar-looking, freckly, red-haired person who is a friend of Harry's. He is mentioned as being on the left side of Harry in the hospital wing.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who has a cracked skull and is in the hospital wing. He is described as looking around and feeling strange.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: A nurse who is taking care of Harry's injury. She mentions that she mended his cracked skull at once.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Someone who Harry had hoped to corner, but it seems he missed the opportunity since the match has finished hours ago.

entities.name: hospital wing
entities.description: The place where Harry is being treated for his injury. It is described as having a sky outside with an indigo streaked with crimson.

relationships.description: Madam Pomfrey is treating Harry's injury, as mentioned in the text: 'Cracked skull,' said Madam Pomfrey, bustling up and pushing him back against his pillows. 'Nothing to worry about, I mended it at once...'
